options.name: Elven Striders
options.description: Elven culture requires quick feet and decision making to survive their harsh homeland. Gain +1 Movement Speed and +1 Initiative.

options.name: Action : Bladedancing
options.description: As part of the Elven culture, you have perfected the Bladedancer form. Make an Attack with a Slashing Weapon and gain a 1d4 Bonus to Dodge Checks until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Naturopathy
options.description: Living in the wilderness has caused a more homegrown focus on healing. Gain +1 Alchemy and +1 Medicine.

options.name: Astral Navigators
options.description: The Elven culture are trained to move with the guidance of celestial bodies and cannot get lost while under the stars. Gain +1 Search and +1 Wilderness.

options.name: Gift from the Stars
options.description: Those who grow up within the Elven culture are exposed to the magic of the stars. You Learn 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Level Cosmic Spells and gain +2 Arcane Mitigation.

options.name: Efficient Archery
options.description: The Elven culture teaches bowmanship at a young age. Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Ranged Weapons. Additionally, Basic Ammunition you make gains 1 Infusion Slot.

options.name: Elven Woads
options.description: Cumbersome armor is rare within Elven Society and most fight with little in the way of protection, often opting to show painted skin. Gain +2 Dodge while not wearing armor.
